sentences.en: She was a strong contender for the Olympic team.
sentences.cn: 她曾是奥林匹克队的一个强大的竞争者。

sentences.en: The team is a serious contender for the title this year.
sentences.cn: 该队是今年不可轻视的夺标竞争者。

sentences.en: Her trainer said yesterday that she would be a strong contender for a place on the Olympic team.
sentences.cn: 她的教练昨天说，她会是取得奥运代表队里一个席位的一名强有力的竞争者。
